description: Alterations and repairs to the building fabric, Replacement windows and doors, Replacement steps on rear elevation, Demolish and replace first floor rear dormer, Installation of PV panels on rear roof slopes and dormer roofs, Installation of ventilation and exhaust grills on rear elevation, Energy efficiency improvements and External alterations
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">045-SI00-P1 – Block Plan; ExGE01-P1 – Existing Elevations;&nbsp; 045-ExGA00-P1 – Existing Ground Floor Plan; 45-ExGA01-P1 Existing First Floor; 45-ExGA02-P1 Existing Second Floor; 045-ExGARF-P1 – Existing Roof Plan 045-GE01-P1 – Proposed elevations; 045-GA00-P2 – Proposed Ground Floor Plan;&nbsp; 045-GA01-P1 – Proposed First Floor Plan; 045-GA02-P1 – Proposed Second Floor Plan; 045-GARF-P1v- Proposed Roof Plan; Eurener PV Panel Specification; Planning Design and Access Statement Ruxandra Palcu Architects; Heritage Statement by Janus (dated Feb 2024); Fire Safety - Reasonable Exception Statement</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">All documents received 10.10.24</span></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

<p>All new external works and finishes shall match the existing adjacent work with regard to the methods used and materials, colour, texture and profile, unless otherwise shown on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by any conditions(s) attached to this consent.</p>

<p>Prior to the commencement of the development hereby approved, a Preliminary Roosting Assessment (and any follow up information / surveys, it or subsequent surveys recommends) for bats, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be implemented in accordance with these approved details, including any mitigation measures highlighted.&nbsp;</p>
